rootCause: Coordinated DDoS attacks claimed by hacktivist groups, including Anonymous Sudan.
impact: Temporarily disrupted access to several government websites and internal services, though the impact was reportedly mitigated quickly.
description: Several French government ministries were targeted by DDoS attacks of 'unprecedented intensity'. The attacks were claimed by pro-Russian hacktivist groups and were designed to overwhelm government servers and disrupt online services.

sources.title: France says government websites hit by cyberattacks of 'unprecedented intensity'
